I played 500 hours on PS4, then the fps drops got too bad and I switched to PC.
I played for 1.4K hours on my main account, then the price of DLCs got too bad and I save injected.
I played for 200 hours on my second account, then the grind got too bad and I save injected.
I have played 30 hours on this account so far, the game is still shit and so I wrote this review.

I despise this game and rarely have fun when I play it. It's buggy as all hell, terribly optimized, very pay to win and the community is one of the worst you'll see. And yet I've put over 2k hours into it and probably triple that amount of time just interacting with the community and watching content creators. 

I've put 5x more time into it than any game ever, and 3/4 of the Discord servers I'm in are focused around it. I've lost friends due to this game, gained new ones from it, and lost some more. I've been called every slur in the world, and also been complimented in every way in the world.

This game is a rollercoaster that some will play for 30 hours then drop leaving bored and dissatisfied, and others will play for 3000 hours and keep playing feeling bored and dissatisfied. This game is shit and you should play it.
I have absurd amounts of hours on this on a different device that didn't carry over and this is my least favorite game :DDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD

After almost 4k hours as mostly a solo queue player it's safe to say that this is the end of the line for me with this game, I used to enjoy playing this on the daily. 6.1.0. released  they decided to buff one role for the newer players that get trashed on by swf(survive with friends) and nerf the the other party completely to the ground. I used deadhard since I started playing this game, they changed it a couple times I never felt so sad about them changing a perk as this one in particulair. The last couple years the changes they made where questionable and some where good, for me it just came to the point where I had enough of it. I don't enjoy this game anymore for a while now and this update pushed me to take a long break or maybe even quit this game for good which is sad since this is my most played game ever. The worst thing is that I didn't even mention the gamebreaking bugs that occur and stay in there for multiple patches. But hey I guess: ''We did a pretty good job so far''
nice game

Conosco di più la storia di sviluppo di sto gioco che la storia del mondo, e fino ad ora non sono stati capaci di bilanciare il gioco. Poi il matchmaking...specialmente il nuovo sistema che fa acqua da tutte le parti, player novizi che si trovano contro player con esperienza. Un gioco con un'idea di base stupenda, sviluppo dei personaggi carina, qualità grafica e ottimizzazione (che descriverò utilizzando un termine machiavellico) UNA MERDA. La community, come per ogni gioco, è sempre un mappazzone tra chi vuole giocare per vincere (non so perchè ma di solito sono sempre o russi / italiani o furry), chi vuole giocare per divertirsi e chi vuole giocare per il gusto di dare fastidio agli altri player (di solito so francesi, bastardi...). L'ho visto nascere, crescere, crescere male (ma tanto male) da 5 anni e ancora lo considero un'opportunità sprecata.
Very fun Game for Family and kids. But be aware! If you play this too long you will become a serial Killer.

Not to mention they without warning deleted offerings to allow you to go to the Stranger Things map despite it still being playable until next month, half the maps are currently bugged (but instead of disabling them or delaying the patch that caused the bugs they just disabled the offerings to go to them), the latest crossover was a complete joke, and currently the team just seems completely out of touch with the community. It's sad, because I absolutely adore this game. I reached over 70 hours in just a month, but I feel like I joined at what is probably the worst time to be a fan of this game. Please do better, BHVR

Very competitive game with a pretty shitty MMR/ranking system atm. Fun with some friends and sometimes relaxing to play 1 or 2 games of killer. Perks and items are an annoyance to you when playing killer because you have to count to 16 instead of 4. Fortunately no in-game purchases that can exceed your chances of winning witch is nice compared to a lot of P2W games out there, but you don't have acces to all character and thus perks but technically you can eventually unlock the ones you want (sadly some you have to buy with DLC's if you want them all)

Jebane gówno, w które nie da się grać, w aktualizacji jedyne co dodają to pare glitchy i jakies skiny które nerdy gracze zeżrą i wydadzą te pieniądze matki. tacy ludzie nawet gówno kupią byle by ładnie zapakować . Developerzy tej gry to jakiś stan umysłu, usuwają system rang, który i tak był od zawsze zjebany a dodają jakiś ukryty dzieki czemu mając 15 minut w tym pierdolniku doświadczeń możesz trafić na gracza z pierdolonymi 4000 godzin. Apropo graczy, można to porównać do społeczności lola ale bardziej zdzieciniałej + zrusyfikowanej coś źle zrobisz już dostajesz tea bagga na morde + spam latarką. Toksyczność graczy można porównać do tej recenzji a nie sorry.... skale wyjebało :). Można dużo się dowiedzieć o swojej matce i czterech ojcach :) taki zwierzyniec troche.

+gameplay nudny , powtarzalny.  Jedyny sens jaki w tym czymś widzę to nietrzeźwe granie customów ze znajomymi chociaż to czasami może też być utrudnione przez liczne błędy i glitche.

Love the game, but the Devs suck butt and need to get their stuff together. Halloween event is short and basically barely anything new added to it, yet the Devs cut out other events so they could put more effort into the Main events. "Make the main events more exciting and spectacular" or something like that, and all we get is old items and get to kick a pumpkin. that's it. To top it all off the new witch survivor that was added had Her best perk removed temporarily ON DAY ONE and was why people were buying her. like bruuuh. A bunch of people just spent money on Her to get the perk just to basically be funding the development ahead of time. they had a PTB for weeks now and still decided to release it and then block her perk? Super scummy. now that with the NFT crap which imo is a total sham. like bruh. work on your game instead of get rich quick scams. lmao

Despite the amount of time I've invested in this game, I don't feel that its been worth it. I don't feel like going into depth so I'll just say that the developers are disconnected with their player base, the game is extremely unbalanced, and the community  is often extremely toxic and entitled. I've had fun times in Dead by Daylight, but when you really become invested in the game, then you see how mishandled it is. Sadly, it is still the king of the asymmetrical genre, and I hope that someone will soon create competition to truly challenge the game.
